@2010kaiser

Windows blue just leaked on 18th April 2013, how you got the OS in 30th March ???

If the techie dude at Best Buy was right in that they don't make 32-bit computers anymore, I have to wonder, what kinda system was this meant for? My newest 32-bit machine is a Toshiba laptop, with 2G ram, 2.2GHz dual-core, could it run it? Probably not very well. Just seems to make sense to me that they would have made this a 64-bit version, since most of the computers Microsoft's "Partners" are using would be just that. Perhaps I'm overthinking it.

Can't wait to see this evolve into production, as any computer I'd be willing to put it on, is x64. :/

I read a lot of comments of low DS (Download Speed) i am downloading this with 1MB/s so.. i will give a good try to this one.! 
Tnx to uploader..!

I hope Windows Blue's Explorer will finally support file paths longer than 255 characters in length. NTFS support thousands of characters in length. I have to use totalcommander to do file transfers.

Also I hope Explorer will finally use the correct units for file storage. MiB and GiB instead of MB and GB.

That is the source of confusion when everybody complains about a 1TB hard drive only having 931GB of capacity or a 500GB drive only having 465GB of capacity! It is because Windows lies.
